oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Studies on synthesis of spirolactone annulated bicyclo[2.2.2] octanes: tricyclic core of yaoshanenolides
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DAS, B
MOBIN, SM
SINGH, V
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Oxidative dearomatization
Cyclohexa-2,4-dienones
pi(4)s+pi(2)s Cycloaddition

Stereoselective Grignard reaction

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A stereoselective approach to tricyclic core of yaoshanenolides from simple aromatic precursor is described. Cycloaddition of highly reactive spiroepoxycyclohexa-2,4-dienone, stereoselective Grignard reaction, alkylation, and ring-closing metathesis reaction are the key features of our approach.
